get_services.Description: Return a list of hed services commands with descriptions.

assemble.Name: assemble
assemble.Description: Validate a BIDS events file with JSON sidecars (passed as strings).

to_long.Description: Convert a target (in string form) to short form if valid, otherwise return errors.

to_short.Description: Convert a file (in string form) to short form if valid, otherwise return errors.

validate.Name: validate
validate.Description: Validate a file passed as strings.

meanings.check_warnings: If true, check for warnings when validating.
meanings.column_x_check: If present with value 'on' indicates that column number x has HED tags.
meanings.column_x_input: Contains the prefix appended to column x if x has HED tags.
meanings.defs_expand: If true, assembly expands definitions and replaces def/XXX with def-expand/XXX.
meanings.events_string: A BIDS events file as a string.
meanings.has_column_names: If true, the first row of the spreadsheet or events file is interpreted as column names.
meanings.hed_columns: List of column numbers (starting with 1) of columns containing HED strings. If empty, all columns are used.
meanings.hed_strings: List of HED strings to be processed.
meanings.json_strings: List of BIDS JSON sidecars as strings.
meanings.schema_string: HED XML schema as a string.
meanings.schema_url: URL from which a HED schema can be downloaded.
meanings.schema_version: Version of HED to used in processing.

returns.error_type: Type of error if the service failed.
returns.error_msg: Explanation of the message if the service failed.

results.command: The command that was executed in response to the service request.
results.data: The data returned by the service. This could be a list of errors or the processed result depending on what happened.
results.schema_version: The version of the HED schema used in the processing.
results.msg_category: One of success, warning, or failure depending on the result of processing the service.
results.msg: Explanation of the result of service processing.
